resources.string: It\'s seems you don\'t have Superuser permission. :( Is your phone Rooted?

"WiFi PV is a small Android application that let you to view passwords of WiFi Networks saved in your device.
WiFi PV by Davide "@Th3Zer0" Silvetti (io@thezero.org) 2013 You can download the source code Here: https://github.com/TheZ3ro/WiFiPV
WiFi Icon made by Freepik (http://www.freepik.com) from www.flaticon.com is licensed by CC BY 3.0
The source is released under \"Do What The Fuck You Want\" License. Feel Free, Be Free. :) "
